TASK: Craft an item of type: brick_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "lime_stained_glass", "quantity": 37, "index": 10}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "diamond_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "acacia_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 26, "index": 33}, {"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 49, "index": 34}, {"type": "skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 58, "index": 38}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 6, "index": 41}, {"type": "lily_pad", "quantity": 63, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a brick_stairs, I need to place 6 bricks in a stair formation in the crafting table. I will start by moving the bricks from slot 41 into the crafting table (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1
